name: FROG THING - A Rage Platformer!
description:
WHEN THE BLUE DOTS APPEAR, JUST CLICK!!!

This is a game made for Mini Jam. It is a rage platformer inspired by This is the Only Level, which is an extremely well made flash game. This is my first game jam entry ever, so I hope you like it.

THE AGE OF FROGS IS HERE. You are an unimportant, Small Frog. However, you are determined to become a famous, Great Frog.  The obstacle course that you must pass though, is very hard. However, to finish each level, you only have 20 seconds. Can you finish this hard FROG THING?
